article_title: Trump: My Health Plan Isn't Socialized Medicine Because 'I Don't Put A Label On It'
article_text: To our readers: The future of the Supreme Court. The most far-right presidential candidates in decades. Non-stop attacks on women’s rights. og.title: Trump: My Health Plan Isn't Socialized Medicine Because 'I Don't Put A Label On It'
